Biophysics 205A: Physical Underpinnings of Biological Systems (PUBS)

The PUBS course is a hands-on, project-based course that integrates proteomics, deep mutational profiling (Fowler and Fields, Nature Methods, 2014), and computational biology.

  • PUBS 2014
    • Paper in eLife
    • eLIFEdigest: Yeast in a class of their own
  • PUBS 2015
  • PUBS 2016

PUBS is now run by Martin Kampmann and examines alpha synuclein!

  • PUBS 2017

This website is open-source and available on Github.
